abstract: My parents surprised my three sisters and me with a "bonding" vacation and carte blanche to travel anywhere to do so. We are 27 to 21, with varied interests and are looking for quality down time, but also activities. Does such a place even exist?
snippet: My parents surprised my three sisters and me with a "bonding" vacation and carte blanche to travel anywhere to do so. We are 27 to 21, with varied interests and are looking for quality down time, but also activities. Does such a place even exist?

headline.main: Q&A: For Sisters, Hawaii May Beckon
